headline.main: Muhammad Ali, My Father and Me

docs.snippet: At age 3, I went one round with the greatest fighter of all time — an experience that bonded me with my sports reporter dad....
docs.abstract: Rosie Schaap recalls photo shoot she attended as a child with her father Dick Schaap, former editor of Sport magazine, in which she playfully boxed with late heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali; says photograph of her and Ali is most tangible connection she has to her father, who died in 2001, and is reminder of how special her childhood really was.
docs.lead_paragraph: At age 3, I went one round with the greatest fighter of all time — an experience that bonded me with my sports reporter dad.

headline.main: State-By-State Look at Chronic Absenteeism Across America
headline.print_headline: State-By-State Look at Chronic Absenteeism Across America

docs.snippet: It's a challenge to teach children who aren't in class — and new government numbers show more than 6.5 million students were absent for at least three weeks of the school year....

headline.main: UN Official Hints Shortlists for Next UN Chief Would Be Good
headline.print_headline: UN Official Hints Shortlists for Next UN Chief Would Be Good

docs.snippet: The U.N. General Assembly president hinted Tuesday that he would like to see groups and individual countries in the world body come up with shortlists of candidates to become the next U.N. chief now that the 11 current contenders have made their c...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. General Assembly president hinted Tuesday that he would like to see groups and individual countries in the world body come up with shortlists of candidates to become the next U.N. chief now that the 11 current contenders have made their case to the 193 member nations.

headline.main: Prosecutor: Pickup Sought Prior to Crash That Killed 5
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Pickup Sought Prior to Crash That Killed 5

docs.snippet: Police were seeking a pickup truck due to reports that it was driving erratically minutes before five adults in a group of bicyclists were struck and killed on a street in western Michigan, a prosecutor said Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police were seeking a pickup truck due to reports that it was driving erratically minutes before five adults in a group of bicyclists were struck and killed on a street in western Michigan, a prosecutor said Tuesday night.

headline.main: Headmaster Leaving After Prep School Sex Abuse Investigation
headline.print_headline: Headmaster Leaving After Prep School Sex Abuse Investigation

headline.main: Turkish Food Group Yildiz Sets Up UK Company to Expand Abroad
headline.print_headline: Turkish Food Group Yildiz Sets Up UK Company to Expand Abroad

docs.snippet: The Turkish owner of Godiva chocolate and McVitie's biscuits has set up a London-based company that will boost its exposure to international markets and investors, helping the company compete in an increasingly competitive global food industry....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Turkish owner of Godiva chocolate and McVitie's biscuits has set up a London-based company that will boost its exposure to international markets and investors, helping the company compete in an increasingly competitive global food industry.

headline.main: Trump Lawyers Channel Obama in Court Filing
headline.print_headline: Trump Lawyers Channel Obama in Court Filing

docs.snippet: When lawyers for Donald Trump asked a court to throw out one of the proposed class actions over Trump University, they backed it up with a financial disclosure meant to bolster the Republican presidential candidate's credentials as a global busine...
docs.lead_paragraph: When lawyers for Donald Trump asked a court to throw out one of the proposed class actions over Trump University, they backed it up with a financial disclosure meant to bolster the Republican presidential candidate's credentials as a global businessman.
